text: 48|18|a marattinre cuvattil vecc satyavisvasikal ninneat pratijna ceytirunna sandarbhattil tirccayayum allahu avare parri trptippettirikkunnu. avarute hrdayannalilullat avan ariyukayum, annane avarkk manas'samadhanam irakkikeatukkukayum, asannamaya vijayam avarkk pratiphalamayi nalkukayum ceytu
